comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Hello,
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
If problem occurs on most of the websites then probably something doesn't work correctly.
Please try to reinstall AdGuard certificate.
To do it, please open AdGuard app, go to `Settings` -> `Network` - `Reinstall Certificate`, like on a screenshot below.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/185327639-ca875068-cabd-4ea6-827c-c2efdc19beaa.png)

</details>

If after reinstalling a certificate issue will still occurs, then please contact with technical support - https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Da: Adam ***@***.***>
Inviato: Thursday, August 18, 2022 7:42:08 AM

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/issues/1024

[https://www.classcentral.com/course/edx-behavioural-economics-in-action-1009](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.classcentral.com%2Fcourse%2Fedx-behavioural-economics-in-action-1009)

comment.body:
From what I can see, it firstly redirects to:
```
 http://www.awin1.com/awclick.php?gid=295463&mid=6798&awinaffid=301045&linkid=599979&p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fbehavioural-economics-in-action&clickref=gtc_direct
```
and then to:
```
https://www.zenaps.com/rclick.php?mid=6798&c_len=5184000&c_ts=1660817458&c_cnt=301045%7C295463%7C599979%7C1660817458%7Cgtc_direct%7Caw%7C0&ir=0dc3c460-1ede-11ed-b38a-2238c37626e7&pr=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fbehavioural-economics-in-action%3Fsource%3Daw%26awc%3D6798_1660817458_8ed6585bb7ac9441b5ac5482d7b467f4%26utm_source%3Daw%26utm_medium%3Daffiliate_partner%26utm_content%3Dtext-link%26utm_term%3D301045_https%253A%252F%252Fwww.class-central.com%252F&bId=HLEX_62fe0fec4d3f92.22504685&cookie=1&c_d=zenaps.com
```
So, as far as I understand, some of these rules should be for `awin1.com` instead of `zenaps.com`, unless you have encountered a different redirection.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.croquetteland.com/connexion?rurl=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.croquetteland.com%2Fconnexion%3Frurl%3D1) ### Comment > Bonjour, > > Quand l'extension AdGuard Blocker est désactivée, je peux accéder à mon espace client normalement. > Quand l'extension AdGuard Blocker est activée, la connexion n'aboutit pas et je retombe tout le temps sur la page de connexion. > J'ai ajouté une capture d'écran du journal de filtrage. > Apparemment c'est à cause de cette règle de filtrage : $cookie=/dwac_/ > Si je débloque cette règle (ajout en liste blanche) via le journal de filtrage, je peux accéder à mon espace client normalement. > > Cordialement. > Franck. > ### Screenshots
